events.name: QualityCheckInitiated
events.description: This event marks the start of a quality control check on a batch.

events.name: QualityCheckCompleted
events.description: This event signifies the completion of a quality control check.

events.name: QualityIssueDetected
events.description: This event is triggered when a quality issue is identified during inspection.

events.name: QualityIssueResolved
events.description: This event indicates that a reported quality issue has been resolved.

commands.name: InitiateQualityCheck
commands.description: This event marks the start of a quality control check on a batch.

commands.name: CompleteQualityCheck
commands.description: This event signifies the completion of a quality control check.

commands.name: ReportQualityIssue
commands.description: This event is triggered when a quality issue is identified during inspection.

commands.name: ResolveQualityIssue
commands.description: This event indicates that a reported quality issue has been resolved.

integrationPoints.name: InventoryManagement
integrationPoints.description: Integration needed to check inventory levels when a quality issue arises.

integrationPoints.name: SupplierManagement
integrationPoints.description: Integration needed to notify suppliers if a batch fails quality checks.

integrationPoints.name: ShippingManagement
integrationPoints.description: Integration required to hold shipping if quality issues are detected.
